Room.Name: Ministry Way/Orchard Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Orchard Lane and Ministry Way.
Room.LongDescription: Ministry Way runs south out of the intersection with Orchard Lane, which runs east and west. On the north side of the intersection is the Brunskid Trader's Guild, where all sorts of items are sold. These items are usually not legal, or possibly stolen. It is also a very dangerous place where theives and assassins abound, lurking in the shadows.
